post.title: thinking maaileen - a case study for pd english and related development
post.body:
here is one chance to use 34 college for the maaileen situation - 
•she needs to develop a network, so everyone can see her work
•if she uses online, for example develop her own site, that is going to cost her about 1000 yuan a year, minimum;
•but if she use 34 media platform, then she gets everything for free, plus all the benefits of of 34 media entity:◦free, reliable, convenient, fast, perpetual.

post.title: case one - real estate english and project
who should contact us
post.body: if your child faces english study problem, if he does not like study english, then come to us, we can design a particular effective program just for your child.

post.title: every project has its unique situation and problem to solve, so there will be many versions and spinoffs down the road
post.body: gg English is just one example. each student faces a particular problem and by solving that particular problem, some new pd English will be developed.

post.title: how this particular project gg English works
post.body:
we will develop and implement that step by step.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1K6pAEUkroJyv8Le4MXhQ9iHZSkFNxkvn5/

post.title: the origin of gg English
post.body:
- it is developed for a boy that is facing a typical problem
- almost all boys can use this method to learn english effectively and benefit from this study
- it enables students to pursue a life goal, solve a real life problem, and learn english at the same time

post.title: gg English - one example of pd English
pd as a style
post.body: pd makes people think of different things. here is one - does it look somewhat like the 69 style of making lov?

post.title: one example of pd English
post.body:
years ago i had this one female student who works on a small but interesting project, that helped her to get into a top college. 

the project is called Stone Windows

it recorded all the windows she could find from around the world that are made by stones. simple.

but it is a lot of work, touches many areas, leads her to many interesting places and subjects. 

how is she doing now?

post.title: the process of pd English learning
post.body:
- discuss with your students and pick a project; 

how to write about your project, you can answer the typical 5W:

- why you pick this as your project
- how you are going to make it work
- what is your plan of building up this project
- when and where to work on it, get yourself a schedule 
- who else is involved

post.title: the key to make pd English work
post.body:
the key is pig.

pig, make sure you work hard and get things written and done. 

then dogs may come and take a look and help you.

post.title: could pig and dog really work together?
post.body:
anybody actually sees pig and dog together? not me. 

let's see and find out.

post.title: so in pd English, who is pig, who is dog?
how to pick a project
how to start - pick a project
post.body:
starting learning in pd English is easy, pick one project, then start writing about your development. 

take a look of this blog, pd English starts from one idea, then becomes a project, and now it is, you see some writings about it. this is a learning process.
